context_bundle.summary: Context Engine Light (CEL) - CLI tool for runtime context management. Tracks token usage, provides cel_status and cel_expand commands. Fixes 8 design holes from KALIC review.

onboarding.quick_start:
CLI: C:\PhiDEX\cel\cel-cli.exe
Commands:
- status: Check fill %, status (ok/warn/critical)
- track -c <category> "text": Log tokens (user/assistant/tool)
- truncate -c "content" -m <max>: Store large content
- expand <id>: Retrieve truncated content
- reset: New conversation
State: C:\PhiDEX\cel\state.json
common_patterns: When warn: summarize, truncate large outputs
When critical: wrap up, suggest new chat
known_errors: Token estimate rough until tiktoken integrated
MCP avoided due to timeout issues - using CLI
cel_state key reserved for CEL, DC uses other keys
